message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $15,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd like to make another offer of $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.
